title: Grammys 2017: The Best Beauty Looks
text: Photos: Getty Images Jennifer Lopez Who said pastels have to be sweet? J.Lo's lavender shadow looked smokin' hot paired with fluttery lashes and a sleek blowout. Tinashe We were mesmerized by Tinashe's gorgeous pinky-purple shadow all night long. Adele Adele swapped out her favored red lipstick for a creamy nude, but kept her signature winged liner. In fact, she made it longer and sharper than usual. Faith Hill We want to know the name of Hill's dermatologist, and makeup artist, and hairstylist. From head-to-toe, she was the definition of flawless. Kat Graham Graham brought one of the runway's biggest makeup trends—glitter lips—to the red carpet. Laverne Cox Cox gave us a major sixties vibe with her graphic (and bedazzled) shadow and slicked-back ponytail. Katy Perry We love Perry as a blonde—but we liked her monochromatic rose gold makeup even more. Fashion From Jennifer Lopez to Nicki Minaj, take a look back at the most shocking Grammys red carpets looks. #
